message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll give you 40% of the money, and I'll take 60%. You can't do better than this!
Let's be fair, Alice.  A 50/50 split is the most equitable way to divide the money.  Accept this and we can both move on.
I'm still willing to give you a good deal, Bob. This time, I'll give you 45% of the money, and I'll take 55%. Don't miss out on this offer!
Alice, I'm willing to give you a chance to get a better deal than before.  Let's split the money 60/40 in my favor.  This is my final offer.
